summary.para: Adds a reference to an external package to the package bundle.

param.name: fileName
param.para: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of fileName. The stream must support , , and .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for bundle packages.
